channel.title: Help pleaseeee (can pay if requested and if allowed)
channel.description:
- Combat level bug needs fixed my server max level should be 138 it has summoning but only goes to 114 - Trade bug after trade you cannot move - Someone to help me upload my jar client onto a webhost with a button that takes you to fourms is all I need. - How to change slots weapons are equipped in (i need lantern and bowsword switch i couldnt find em)
Ill pay 3$ for the webclient host ill be hosting i just need help uploading the others will be based on how many you can fix. Thanks

item.title: Help pleaseeee (can pay if requested and if allowed)
item.dc:creator: @reality0scape reality0scape
item.description:
@reality0scape wrote:

the last thing is very easy, cba to check the other points ;).

but for your lantern and bow-sword, open Item.java
And put your lantern and bowsword ids after “public static int shields[] = {”

Read full topic
item.source: Help pleaseeee (can pay if requested and if allowed)
